Key Match Events: Fernando Tatis Jr. hit a two-run home run in the second inning, giving the Padres a 6-1 lead.

Mookie Betts hit a home run, ending a 0-for-22 playoff slump.
Post-Match Reflections: Freddie Freeman acknowledged the team's fight after the six-run inning in the second.

Miscellaneous Highlights: Robert Suarez struck out Gavin Lux on a full-count pitch to complete a four-out save.
The game was played at Petco Park in San Diego with a crowd of 47,744.
Walker Buehler allowed five runs and five hits in five innings, with three strikeouts and one walk.
